content.raw: One more issue, since this is a PID velocity control, the block in the example world drifts down ever so slowly. If I let simulation sit around long enough it will have moved completely downwards. Should we consider switching to position control?
content.html: One more issue, since this is a PID velocity control, the block in the example world drifts down ever so slowly. If I let simulation sit around long enough it will have moved completely downwards. Should we consider switching to position control?
